faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Raaya is a medical platform that helps patients book appointments with doctors and clinics easily across various specialties.
faq.q2: How does the booking process work?
faq.a2: The patient selects the doctor or specialty, chooses an available time, and confirms the details to get instant booking confirmation.
faq.a3: Yes, booking through Raaya is completely free, and no extra charges are added.
faq.a4: Raaya only shows available slots provided by the doctor or clinic. Once booked, the appointment is officially reserved under the patient’s name.
faq.q5: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
faq.a5: Yes, patients can cancel or modify appointments according to each clinic’s policies. Some clinics allow instant changes, while others may require contacting support.
faq.q6: How can I contact customer service?
faq.a6: You can contact us via the contact page, WhatsApp, email, or the hotline on the website.
faq.q7: Do doctors pay to join the platform?
faq.a7: Raaya offers subscription plans for doctors and clinics to manage appointments and increase visibility to patients.
faq.q8: What specialties are available on Raaya?
faq.a8: The platform includes many specialties like Pediatrics, Dentistry, Dermatology, Cardiology, OB/GYN, Orthopedics, and more.
faq.q9: Can I see the consultation price before booking?
faq.a9: Yes, Raaya displays each doctor’s consultation fee clearly before booking.
faq.a10: Yes, you can view patient ratings and reviews for doctors before booking to ensure a better experience.

footer.p: Book appointments across different specialties without calls or waiting.
